name: Tom Kha Gai (for 2)
description: Chicken coconut soup with galangal, kaffir lime leaves, mushrooms and onions. Gluten-free. Please specify – mild, medium, hot, Thai hot.

name: Tom Yum Goong (for 2)
description: Clear broth spicy and sour soup with shrimp, lemon grass, onions, mushrooms and basil leaves. Gluten-free. Please specify – mild, medium, hot, Thai hot.

name: Rice Noodle Soup (for 2)
description: Rice noodles with chicken and bean sprouts in a clear broth. Gluten-free.
